page1.title: About Me
page1.content: On this site, I share my personal thoughts around technology, data, and personal projects. I’m a Data Governance & Data Quality professional, and I like to spend my time thinking about technology and how it influences our lives. . Reach out to me if you’d like to talk about anything data, enterprise project management methodologies, or computer science. . My preferred contact method is email: sergiomoraes@ieee.org but you can also find me on Twitter @SergiMoraes . . . Tip: Consider supporting the Python Software Foundation
